plot: After his home is destroyed by deforestation, Blinky Bill sets out on a quest to find his displaced mother.
title: Las aventuras de Blinky Bill
plot_es: After his home is destroyed by deforestation, Blinky Bill sets out on a quest to find his displaced mother.
plot_en: After his home is destroyed by deforestation, Blinky Bill sets out on a quest to find his displaced mother.
